auth.subtitle_signin: Sign in to access your lists
auth.subtitle_signup: Create an account to save your progress
auth.account_created: Account created. You can sign in now.

translate.title: Translate
translate.subtitle: Choose languages ¬∑ powered by AI
translate.placeholder: Word or short phrase (up to {{max}} words)
translate.hint: Words, phrases & idioms only. No sentences.
translate.err_empty: Enter a word or short phrase.
translate.err_too_long_words: Too many words. Keep it under {{max}}.
translate.err_too_long_chars: Too long. Keep it under {{max}} characters.
translate.err_sentence: Looks like a sentence. Lexum translates words & short phrases ‚Äî please shorten.
translate.add_to_list_failed: Failed to add the word to the list
translate.limit_ai_body: You've used all {{max}} AI translations today on Free. Resets midnight UTC.

lists.title: My Lists
lists.mix_body: This list mostly contains words translated as {listPair}. You are adding a word translated as {newPair}. They will be mixed in one list.
lists.mix_remember: Remember this choice for this list
lists.empty_words_subtitle: Add words from Translate to start building your vocabulary.
lists.not_reviewed_yet: You haven't reviewed these words yet
lists.word_lang_mismatch: The word to translate must be written in {{lang}}
lists.mix_confirm_body: This list contains words translated as {{listPair}}, but this word is translated as {{newPair}}. The list will have words with different language pairs.
lists.limit_lists: List limit reached ({{max}} max on Free). Upgrade to Pro for up to 50 lists.
lists.limit_words: Word limit reached ({{max}} max on Free). Upgrade to Pro for up to 10,000 words.
lists.limit_saves: Daily save limit reached ({{max}}/day on Free). Upgrade to Pro for 150 saves/day.

profile.title: Profile
profile.weakness_map_hint: Higher = harder than avg for you
profile.diff_no_data: Practice more words to see analytics
profile.factor_freq_info: How often this word appears in everyday speech. Rare words are harder to recall.
profile.factor_poly_info: How many distinct meanings this word has. More meanings = more confusion.
profile.factor_morph_info: How complex the word's grammatical structure is (prefixes, suffixes, conjugation).
profile.factor_phrase_info: Whether this is an idiom or multi-word expression. Fixed phrases are harder to learn.
profile.empty_state_title: Keep translating to see your stats
profile.empty_state_subtitle: Translate and add words, then practice them to unlock your Progress Center.
profile.vocab_growth_empty_sub: Start translating to track your vocabulary growth.
profile.heatmap_empty_sub: Complete practice sessions to see your accuracy over time.
profile.activity_empty_sub: Practice your saved words to see review stats here.
profile.diff_empty_sub: Practice at least 5 words to see your personal difficulty profile.
profile.ale_section_hint: Scores update after each practice session
profile.ale_factor_freq_info: How well you recall rare or uncommon words.
profile.ale_factor_poly_info: How well you handle words with multiple meanings.
profile.ale_factor_morph_info: How well you manage grammatically complex words.
profile.ale_factor_idiom_info: How well you learn fixed expressions and idioms.
profile.ale_no_data: Practice words to build your profile
profile.ale_no_data_sub: Your adaptive profile will appear after your first practice session.
profile.ale_free_cta_body: Enable the engine to automatically focus your daily plan on your weakest areas.
profile.info_vocab_growth: Shows how many new words you saved each day. The higher the bar, the more words you added. Use this to see whether you're building your vocabulary consistently or in bursts.
profile.info_velocity: How fast your vocabulary is growing. A positive number means you added more words than you removed or forgot. Great for tracking whether your learning is picking up speed.
profile.info_review_activity: Your practice summary for the last 30 days ‚Äî total attempts, correct answers, and overall accuracy. Accuracy above 70% means you're in great shape. Below 50% ‚Äî you might be adding words that are too hard too quickly.
profile.info_heatmap: Each square is one day. Green = high accuracy, red = lots of mistakes, white = no practice. A row of greens means you're on a streak. Reds show which days were tough ‚Äî that's normal and useful to know.
profile.info_difficulty_overview: Your personal difficulty score is calculated based on how you actually perform ‚Äî not just how hard the words are in general. A lower score means the words in your lists feel easier for you. The trend arrow shows whether your practice is getting easier (‚Üó) or harder (‚Üò) over time.
profile.info_ale: The Adaptive Engine watches how you answer different types of words and builds a picture of your strengths and weak spots. It then adjusts your daily practice plan to focus more on the areas where you need the most work ‚Äî so your time is spent where it matters most.
profile.lang_empty_sub: Save words to see your language pair statistics.
profile.lang_role_hint: How often each language is practiced as source (recognition) vs target (recall).

settings.title: Settings
settings.translation_dir_hint: How to determine translation direction when you enter a word
settings.daily_goal_hint: Affects the day plan and motivation prompts
settings.notif_practice_hint: Remind me to practice when I haven't reviewed today
settings.notif_today_hint: Remind me when today's plan is not completed
settings.sign_out_confirm_body: You can sign back in at any time.
settings.delete_account_warning: This will permanently delete your account and all data: words, lists, practice history. This cannot be undone.
settings.delete_account_checkbox: I understand that all my data will be deleted
settings.delete_account_confirm_body: All your words, lists and progress will be permanently deleted.
settings.about_description: Lexum helps you learn vocabulary faster with smart spaced repetition and AI-powered translations.

pro.hero_subtitle: Unlock advanced analytics and tools designed to accelerate your vocabulary growth.
pro.feature_alts_desc: See more translation options and nuanced meanings for every word.
pro.feature_saves_desc: Save 15√ó more words daily (vs 10/day on Free).
pro.feature_ai_desc: Translate 40√ó more words with AI context (vs 5/day on Free).
pro.feature_lists_desc: Organise your full vocabulary library (vs 3 lists / 200 words on Free).
pro.feature_practice_desc: Practice as many sessions as you want every day (vs 3/day on Free).
pro.feature_plan_desc: Get a personalised 30-word daily queue focused on your weakest words (vs 10/day on Free).
pro.feature_wordstats_desc: See complete practice history, decay curves, and per-word accuracy over time (last 100 sessions vs 10 on Free).
pro.feature_filters_desc: Filter words by learning state (new / learning / mastered / decaying) and due date.
pro.feature_analytics_desc: Detailed vocabulary analytics, accuracy heatmaps, and growth charts.
pro.feature_difficulty_desc: Understand exactly which word types are hardest for you personally.
pro.feature_ale_desc: AI-powered skill scoring automatically focuses your daily plan on your weakest linguistic areas ‚Äî frequency, grammar, idioms, and more.
pro.feature_lang_analytics_desc: See practice activity and accuracy per language pair. Understand your role breakdown ‚Äî how well you recognise vs produce each language.
pro.legal: Payment will be charged to your Apple ID. Subscription auto-renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the period.
pro.success_body: Your subscription is now active. Enjoy all Pro features!
pro.error_body: Something went wrong. Please try again.
pro.restore_success_body: Your Pro subscription has been restored.
pro.restore_none_body: We couldn't find any previous purchases for this Apple ID.
pro.coming_soon_desc: Purchases will be available once the app launches on the App Store. Stay tuned!
pro.free_search: Text search in all your lists

practice.no_due_subtitle: No words due for review right now
practice.tooltip_due: Words that need review today based on your spaced repetition schedule
practice.tooltip_mastered: Words you've successfully reviewed 5+ times with high confidence
practice.tooltip_total: Total unique words across all your lists
